name: fellowship
description: An unopinionated bitwise memory based ACL

scripts.pretest: npm run-script lint && npm run-script checkStyle
scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: James Mortemore <jamesmortemore@gmail.com>
